title: WHY DO WE GET PEOPLE LIKE THIS CAN THEY BE BANNED????
body:

replies.body:
Sorry i can't entirely free you from blame here.

In the first example, player 1 asked nicely and i dont see anyone saying yes. Since you adamantly say you are a Riven main and would have carried, any reason for not saying anything? I'll give you the benefit of the doubt on this one.

In the second example though, you start calling player 2 stupid. Well then I wouldnt be surprised if that makes them trolling more likely. Also,player 3 is the voice of reason and then you "wtf" question their Xin pick?

Sure, in the case of player 1 and player 2, maybe they would have trolled anyway regardless of how you reacted. But you didn't help the situation either.
Well stated.

> [{quoted}](name=VroxBox,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=RLT4HBOr,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-12-06T11:21:15.258+0000)
>

> VroxBox : everyone knows you dont play ranked unless you can play a champ in each role


Okay now this is probably one of the dumbest things I've heard someone say in this game.

so explain to me how I got gold in my first season on League while not being able to play ADC/Support at all.

*your first season

Have you heard of autofill now a days?

Hense why your not aloud to play ranked unless you have 16 champs owned
Some queues are auto fill protected and you don't need to learn how to play all the roles to play ranked lol, as the guy above said.
YOU ALWAYS GET AN AUTO FILL EVERY FEW MATCHES, you obviously havent played lol in quite some time.

Im so confused... can you explain what happened?

Because quite frankly it seems like to me he just got autofilled top, and as he doesn't play top he played riven for the first time. What else could he do if no one else gave up their lane for him?

So im a riven main and seeing as he didnt get his preffered role he saw that i had chosen riven, and decided to insta lock her as his first time riven.
So obviously he has other champions to play in the top lane.

What else could he have done?
Well for starters he could not have chosen riven, as i wouldve carried his sorry ass
Do i even need to name any more things?

Players like these who dont get there way are disgusting

You're being a little bit controlling IMO...

It's preseason, this is the best time to be testing new picks, especially ones with high learning curves like Riven. You can advise him to pick another champion, but at the end of the day it's his choice not yours.

Yeah I understand Riven was the champion you wanted, but you didn't even ask him to change. You just announced you would dodge if he picked Riven. Which BTW, would be perfect for him since he didn't get his main role.

I understand that it it pre season and testing new picks, but he couldve gone into a norms game and done that other then going into a ranked game where people are trying to reach a higher rank,

i did ask him to not choose riven but he insta locked her as he was a "higher pick then me"

You're not entirely at fault for what happened. I totally understand where you're coming from; I agree this guy probably should have picked someone else for the benefit of the team. But from the chat logs, it looks like it was you who escalated the situation. 

Next time I'd recommend giving players like this the benefit of the doubt first. Good manners go a long way in situations like this. For example something like:

_"Do you think you can let me have Riven pls? I main her :("_

If you had said that in this case, I would be 100% on your side :D
Yeah ill keep that in mind for next time! :)

Higher pick order means nothing

Your fuckign assigned a role. (Riot needs to make it a bannable offense)

I just had a game, where in lobby someone said, "Can I go Jungle" no one said anything, so when it came to him, he auto locked Lee Sin, and forced our jungler to go ADC.
All because "He was a higher pick order and no one said anything"

He had smite, 10 seconds left on the clock, he swapped smite for heal.
and said "Ok I go ADC"

so we had a jungler without smite feeding his ass off all game, and claiming everything was an "Accident"

It was said ages ago, but we need to be able to report during champion select.
Or some form of vote to kick someone like in your case, for being an asshole.
i think a vote to kick would  be abused. 4 friends queue up they get matched with players who have bad kda's they will kick him just for being bad not for the intended reason of trolling
Yeah I agree a vote to kick would be abused like crazy, but something really needs to be put in place.

Not in solo Q.
Which is where its needed.
Feels bad man, Rito really need to punish people like this, or even make a pool of bad sportsman like people so that they are all in one division or something alike.
No offence but ew, Silver 5 Riven Main?

your point is?

Is that why you have attack speed runes for your page? 

Can you not fast combo?

lol you looked into my Profile? Cute, also yes, i can in fact fast combo lol (Could send you a Video if you want to learn : ^) ), 300K Riven for a reason bud, i run Attack speed so i could aa minions and get lvs faster and it makes my fast combo smoother as well, personal preference just like how some people like AD on her but i prefer Lethality, if you were anywhere above silver, you would know that every Riven has different play styles but uses the same principle, but obviously you're not lol. (Also looked into your profile cause i'm classy like that, i could say that you have funny runes for her having 1% crit chance, at least my page is viable xd) BTW you're masteries are so messy Jesus dude, ever heard of management?

that 1% crit chance can determine you an easy first blood or make you work for it, my masteries are messy because when i play a champ i dont usually play i change one and forget to chance it. 

Yes i do know about play styles im not a retard.

Just because your a "higher elo" doesnt mean you have to be rude to lower elo players who main a champ 

Plus sick as match history you have there all them defeats must be tough

Really is considering that I go positive most of the games, I didn't really intend to be a dick when I said what I did, it's kind of like a joke like UE is in LCS but not really, sorry if it came our wrong

the toxicity created by autofill  is staggering.
So tired of trying to improve only to have my team fighting in chat before the game even starts.
Feels bad man, I know your pain
So he didn't want you to play riven jungle, and manipulated you into dodging, giving him a chance at a different role. He's smart.

No he was being a troll and just because he didnt get his role, like he said "first time riven" like come on who does this, its un fair on people.

But yes in his case he was being smart.
